p: This manuscript aims to present a treatment algorithm we applied to manage COVID-19 patients admitted to our hospital and describe the characteristics of COVID-19 patients and the outcomes of the algorithm. This single-center, retrospective observational study was conducted in the Istanbul Medeniyet University Goztepe EA Hospital, a 600-bed affiliated hospital located in the Anatolian side of Istanbul. We obtained ethical approval from the Institute Ethics Committee, and signed informed consent was waived (2020/0193).
